text:
@joncoopertweets LOL Jon, it's him.

& Lawsuits, big mean ugly ones.

Hannity needs to run for cover, people will point to his many unsafe statements & his downplay of COVID-19 dangers in huge class-action suits against Fox News.

They have already started online.

People blame Fox News in video.
